Trial_Design.evidence: Twenty children ages 12–17 years were enrolled, with 10 children in each of two groups based on diagnosis

Participants.evidence: Twenty children ages 12–17 years were enrolled, with 10 children in each of two groups based on diagnosis (idiopathic scoliosis or non-idiopathic scoliosis).

Objective.evidence: The aim of this study was to determine the pharmacokinetics of EACA in adolescents undergoing spinal fusion surgery and make dosing recommendations.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Twenty children ages 12–17 years were enrolled, with 10 children in each of two groups based on diagnosis
